item.title: Quickly Deploy a Git Project on a Server With Ssh
item.author: Antoine Martin
item.description: So you have this brand new project my_project of yours with your local Git repository set up and you want to quickly make it available for others to clone on your repository server. All your projects are located in your server git.mycompany.com under /srv/git. You’re using the user named git to connect to your server with the SSH private key located in ~/.ssh/git. Here is the quickiest way to deploy your projet:
